pullRequest.body:
This was [relevant in Lean 3](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113488-general/topic/Typeclass.20resolution.20under.20binders/near/245151099), but everything just works now.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

### PR summary [963563ae54](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20349/commits/963563ae54ff13412dd50137c5cb968d3defed78)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

`- instance (priority := 100) NormedAlgebra.toNormedSpace' {ùïú'} [NormedRing ùïú'] [NormedAlgebra ùïú ùïú'] :`
`- instance (priority := 100) NormedSpace.toModule' : Module ùïú F`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

---

<details><summary>Decrease in tech debt: (relative, absolute) = (1.00, 0.00)</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|4834|-1|porting notes|

Current commit [963563ae54](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/963563ae54ff13412dd50137c5cb968d3defed78)
Reference commit [5bf0f3993d](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/5bf0f3993d81f682aab73c6129b25b49da7144fa)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/551fb47b-cd13-4b46-9d13-708734a66d87) for commit e0a3c1ac6853e8cbe344f62d2b247601032fec1e.
The entire run failed.
Found no runs to compare against.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/15b5b872-1378-498e-81f3-df066c627b3b) for commit 963563ae54ff13412dd50137c5cb968d3defed78.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/bda00387-8b50-4d6c-ab41-579c9938c0d4/to/15b5b872-1378-498e-81f3-df066c627b3b) against commit 5bf0f3993d81f682aab73c6129b25b49da7144fa:
```diff
  Benchmark                                   Metric         Change
  =================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Module.ZLattice.Basic      instructions    -8.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Calculus.ContDiff.Basic   instructions    -3.8%
```
üöÄ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by YaelDillies.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded!

*And happy new year! üéâ*

  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12581428412/job/35065201101)

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: an `RCLike` field is a real-inner product space of dim at most two
